subject: Re: Order #SSN4328, how did it go?
description_text:
Still testing, I do have an issue with the wheel .

My issue is while testing on Assetto Corsa Comp the wheel  inverts within a
couple of minutes. right after I started my race. it still works but my
button box is upside down. I am using my Accufroce extreme base. This does
not happen with any of my other wheels.

Once I can resolve this issue I can do a review on your product.

Please advise with a fix.

R/Mike

conversations.body_text: Hi M Almo,  Could you please provide a video? We will help analyze the issue. Please send it to us via Google Drive and set the appropriate viewing permissions. Thank you!

Hello

please see attached video. The wheel is upside down. I will also do another
test tomorrow. I hope you can resolve this. I really like this wheel.

R/Mike

Michael Almodovar

On Wed, Dec 24, 2025 at 10:30 PM service@simsonn.com

Hi M Almo,  If this happens, it indicates that the computer’s grounding is not reliable, possibly because a three-prong plug was not used with a three-prong wall outlet. You can refer to the post below: connect the computer case to the stand, and connect the control box to the metal screws on the pedals. This should resolve the disconnection issue.  https://github.com/SHWotever/SimHub/wiki/USB-Issues-Troubleshooting https://support.gomezsimindustries.com/portal/en/kb/articles/understanding-emi-and-grounding

Thanks, I'll check it out! will let you know if this will solve the problem.

R/Mike
